features.additionalInfo: You can choose anyone 18 years or older to receive a Corporate Card.

Through AutoPay you can choose to have the full closing balance, minimum amount due or a set amount (assuming it's more than the minimum amount due and less than the full closing balance) directly debited from a transaction account.
Regardless of your business structure and needs, we have an online banking solution that will suit you.
Complimentary transit accident insurance up to $250,000 for cardholders.
Unauthorised Use insurance up to $150,000 a year.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Each application for credit is assessed on the ability of the applicant to service debt (limit) based on the financials supplied in the application.

fees.name: Non-Commonwealth Bank ATM balance enquiry fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on our processing of each request. Fee applies to balance enquiries at ASB Bank in New Zealand, Commonwealth Bank in Indonesia and Commonwealth Bank in Vietnam.

fees.name: Emergency issue/ lost/ replacement card fee
fees.additionalInfo: When you need an emergency replacement card delivered to you and may be charged on card replacement.

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on: 1. Account holder accepting the Bank's offer 2. Bank approving the account holder's request for credit limit increase.

fees.name: Late Payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if the minimum payment on Credit Cards is not received by the due date.

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we first allow you to exceed your credit limit in a statement period.

fees.name: Cash equivalent items or cash substitutes cash advance charge
fees.additionalInfo: Charge applies to purchases of cash equivalent items or cash substitutes including gambling transactions and traveller's cheques.

fees.name: International Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies anytime cash advances, purchases or permitted transactions are converted by MasterCard from foreign currencies to Australian Dollas equivalents. The fee includes the fee MasterCard impose on us (1.00%). For cash advances, the relevant cash advance will also apply. Applies where a transaction is in Australian dollars but the party accepting the card is overseas. Please note additional fees may be charged by the overseas merchant.

fees.name: Annual Fee per card
fees.additionalInfo: Standard fees are 1-49 cards = $40.00 per card; 50-499 cards = $32.00 per card; 500+ cards = $24.00 per card.

fees.name: Commonwealth Bank ATM cash advance charge
fees.additionalInfo: Charge applies to cash advances at Commonwealth Bank ATMs.

fees.name: Commonwealth Bank over-the-counter cash advance charge
fees.additionalInfo: Charge applies to cash advances at Commonwealth Bank Branches.

fees.name: Non-Commonwealth Bank ATM cash advance charge
fees.additionalInfo: Charge applies to cash advances through a terminal of other financial institutions in Australia, at ASB Bank in New Zealand, Commonwealth Bank in Indonesia and Commonwealth Bank in Vietnam.

fees.name: Non-Commonwealth Bank over-the-counter cash advance charge
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies to cash advance transactions made at other financial institutions within Australia.

fees.name: Any other Commonwealth Bank Network cash advance charge
fees.additionalInfo: Charge applies to cash advances by way of funds transfer through NetBank, Phone bank Transfer, Commonwealth Bank Customer Service Centre, Australia Post, 132221 Transfer Cash, NetBank Transfer Home Loan, Mobile Bank Transfer and NetBank Transfer Personal Loan.

fees.name: Overseas terminal or bank cash advance charge

data.name: Corporate Low Rate card
data.description: Designed for medium businesses wishing to manage their cash flow by paying down larger items over time. Options to monitor employee expenses, set limits and access expense reports in order to minimise costs.
